definitions.definition: having a greater than average height

examples.text: the tallest building in the world
a tall glass of iced tea
He's **grown taller** since I last saw him.

definitions.definition: used to describe or ask about the height of somebody/something

examples.text: He's six feet tall and weighs 200 pounds.

definitions.definition: to be very difficult to do
something large and successful often begins in a very small way
to show that you are proud and able to deal with anything

examples.text: Suddenly he seemed to stand taller.

wordOrigin: late Middle English: probably from Old English getæl ‘swift, prompt’. Early senses also included ‘fine, handsome’ and ‘bold, strong, good at fighting’.
